Michelle Obama pulls off a 'daring' hair transformation, what it means for the US Presidential Elections

Former First Lady Michelle Obama has pulled off a rather unusual and interesting hair transformation, that has caught the eyes of netizens across the globe. On the occasion of National Book Lovers Day, her shared picture on social media, where she was seen flaunting her new hairstyle, garnered thousands of likes and comments. Here's what we know about it.

13 Aug, 2024, 06:25 AM IST

Has Barack Obama been check mated? Here is the role that Joe Biden may have played in it

Former US President Barack Obama may have been check mated by Joe Biden. The recent political developments in the US may have not gone in his favor, as tries to exert control over the party affairs. He did not immediately endorse Kamala Harris as the partyâ€™s presidential nominee.

28 Jul, 2024, 01:20 AM IST

Why did Michelle Obama endorse Kamala Harris after she emerged as only Democrat contender who can beat Republican Donald Trump. Details here.

In an opinion survey conducted by the 'Daily Express US' in partnership with 'The Democracy Institute', Michelle Obama got 41% of the vote and surpassed all other potential Democratic nominees for the US Presidential Election 2024. Vice President Kamala Harris came third after Hillary Clinton.

27 Jul, 2024, 05:50 PM IST

US Presidential Election 2024: Here is why Donald Trump may be slightly worried; according to the findings of this survey

According to a survey, Trump and Harris are in a neck-to-neck competition with the former president leading by a single point against the Vice-President. Among the voters who are below 45-years of age, Harris has a 10-point lead over Trump.

26 Jul, 2024, 10:19 PM IST

Who are the people in Kamala Harris's inner circle? Here are some clues

Kamala Harris is all set to receive the official presidential nomination from the Democratic party. She has started her campaign and has been busy appointing advisors who will play a critical role in the upcoming campaign. Many of these individuals are a part of her inner circle consisting of family members, friends and former aides. The advisors she is planning to appoint may also indicate the policies she may pursue during her presidency.

26 Jul, 2024, 06:58 PM IST

Barack and Michelle Obama endorse Kamala Harris, giving her expected but crucial support

Former President Barack Obama and former first lady Michelle Obama have endorsed Kamala Harris for the White House. The endorsement, announced on Friday morning, comes as Harris builds momentum after President Joe Biden's decision to end his reelection bid and support his vice president against Republican nominee and former President Donald Trump.

26 Jul, 2024, 04:25 PM IST

Watch when the Obamas called Kamala Harris to endorse her Presidential bid

Former President Barack Obama and his wife Michelle endorsed Kamala Harris' presidential bid in a one-minute video call. Obama expressed pride while Michelle emphasized the historic significance. Harris, grateful, expressed enthusiasm for the campaign. This support boosts Harris, who gains momentum following Biden's withdrawal. Obama's endorsement is expected to enhance fundraising and energy for Harris' campaign.

26 Jul, 2024, 04:23 PM IST

US Presidential Election 2024: Is Michelle Obama replacing Joe Biden? Here is what the prediction market believes

US President Joe Biden has ended his election campaign and Kamala Harris may replace him on the ballot box. The prediction markets too believe this. However, there is another candidate whose chances are increasing. She has not expressed her interest in electoral politics but people are placing bets on her nomination. Former First Lady Michelle Obama is in the game and may just have a chance to become the first woman POTUS.

25 Jul, 2024, 06:29 PM IST

US Elections 2024: Why Barack Obama didn't endorse Kamala Harris as the next US President, new reports reveal

US Elections 2024: Former President Barack Obama has yet to endorse Vice President Kamala Harris for the 2024 presidential race, citing concerns about her ability to defeat Republican candidate Donald Trump and handle critical issues. A source close to the Biden family revealed that Obama views Harris as incompetent, particularly due to her handling of immigration and other key topics. Despite Bidenâ€™s endorsement of Harris following his withdrawal from the race, Obama is reportedly frustrated and had preferred Senator Mark Kelly as a candidate.

25 Jul, 2024, 12:56 PM IST

Asparagus fortune teller predicts Michelle Obama to be next US president. Know how Mystic Veg uses asparagus to tell future

Jemima Packington is a soothsayer who has predicted that Michelle Obama would be the next US president by defeating Republican candidate Donald Trump in the US Presidential Election 2024.

24 Jul, 2024, 01:46 AM IST

US Presidential Election 2024: Kamala Harris faces opposition; who else may challenge her nomination?

Former US President Joe Biden has ended his election campaign and endorsed Vice-President Kamala Harris. Though she is the front runner, there is opposition to her nomination and many others may challenge her. The Democrats are on the back foot with Trumpâ€™s victory prospects increasing every day. They will have to pick their candidate after considering many factors and this will have to be done soon.

23 Jul, 2024, 10:00 PM IST

U.S Presidential election 2024: Is Michelle Obama in the race for Democratic Party nomination after Joe Biden drops out?

US President Joe Biden has ended his election campaign and pulled out of the US Presidential Election 2024. The Democrats will be holding their national convention to pick a new candidate. While Kamala Harris is expected to bag the nomination, there could be last minute surprises. Former First Lady Michelle Obama is winning in all national surveys, though she has stayed away from active politics.

23 Jul, 2024, 06:30 PM IST

US Presidential Election 2024: Barack Obama has not endorsed any candidate after Joe Biden quit the race; will Michelle Obama replace Biden?

Former US President Barack Obama has praised his former Deputy Joe Biden. He praised his domestic agenda and foreign policy achievements. Even as Joe Biden quit the race and endorsed Vice-President Kamala Harris, Obama has refused to endorse any candidate.

22 Jul, 2024, 09:58 PM IST

US Presidential Election 2024: What are the odds of Kamala Harris replacing Joe Biden? Betting markets reflect recent trends

The betting markets have given a thumbs-up to the prospects of VP Kamala Harris replacing Joe Biden on the ballot box as a presidential nominee of the Democratic Party. This has especially increased after the president has tested positive for COVID-19.

20 Jul, 2024, 02:16 AM IST

Who is Sasha Obama? How has she achieved physical transformation?

Sasha Obama, the youngest daughter of Michelle and former President Barack Obama, has been noticed for her dedication to fitness. Influenced by her family's wellness values, Sasha's rigorous workout routine is paying off.

11 Jul, 2024, 11:34 PM IST

As Democrats face chaos at home, Michelle Obama goes for a fun-filled holiday in Mallorca with ex-Google boss

Michelle Obama has been seen partying in Mallorca at a time when Democrats are panicked at the dismal performance of Joe Biden at the first presidential debate and many of them want the president to step aside. Why is the former first lady not coming forward to help Democrats come out of this crisis?

11 Jul, 2024, 06:55 PM IST

Why is Michelle Obama not contesting US Presidential Election which she is expected to win?

The Democrats are worried and Joe Bidenâ€™s decision not to step down is just one of the concerns. They have a great candidate who is expected to win comprehensively against Donald Trump but she is unwilling to contest the election. The candidate is none other than former First Lady Michelle Obama.

07 Jul, 2024, 02:02 PM IST

US Presidential Election 2024: Michelle Obama ahead of Trump in a survey; will she represent the Democrats in the upcoming election?

A survey has found that former First Lady Michelle Obama has greater support than Donald Trump. As the Democrats are seeking to replace Joe Biden, will she receive an official presidential nomination? She has said that she is not interested in electoral politics and has extended her support to Biden. However, she has also expressed her concerns regarding Trumpâ€™s return to the White House.

04 Jul, 2024, 05:10 AM IST

Is Michelle Obama distancing herself from Joe Bidenâ€™s re-election campaign?

Michelle Obama has not been actively involved in supporting Joe Bidenâ€™s re-election campaign. Some have pointed out that she is not interested in a career in politics while others say that she is unhappy with the way Hunter Biden treated his ex-wife. Kathleen Buhle and Michelle are good friends.

29 Jun, 2024, 10:12 AM IST

US Presidential Debate: Are Democrats looking to replace Joe Biden?

The first US Presidential Debate between Joe Biden and Donald Trump ended on a disastrous note for the incumbent president. He was found fumbling on many occasions and appeared to be under-confident. Donald Trump cornered him throughout the 90-minute debate. Many Democrats have now called on the party to replace Biden ahead of the US Presidential election in November. His supporters have dismissed these opinions.

28 Jun, 2024, 06:51 PM IST

Barack Obama makes surprise statement, says wife Michelle urged daughters 'not to pursue a career in politics'

Former US President Barack Obama has reportedly revealed that his wife and former First Lady, has urged their children to stay away from making a career in politics. In a recently-held fundraiser held in support of reigning US President Joe Biden, former President Obama shed some light on the context of his daughters following his footsteps and joining politics.

18 Jun, 2024, 12:37 PM IST

Is Michelle Obama replacing Joe Biden as the Democratic party candidate in the US Presidential polls?

A Republican Representative has suggested that the conviction of Hunter Biden provides an opportunity to Michelle Obama to replace Joe Biden as the official Democratic party nominee in the upcoming US Presidential polls.

14 Jun, 2024, 09:04 PM IST

Who is Sasha Obama? What did Barack and Michelle Obama do on her 23rd birthday?

Barack Obama and Michelle Obama wish their daughter Sasha on her 23rd birthday by giving her good wishes and more on social media.

11 Jun, 2024, 11:22 PM IST
